thread.title: CW
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by CW

author: CW
title: CW
text: This is our second purchase from Planet of the Vapes and we have always been very pleased with the easy order system and the fast service. The products we have purchased to date have been great also (havent tried the new one yet) Would highly recommend. Only complaint.. wish the site offered it in canadian dollars. I always forget its in US ;)
